korosh_afshar@... wrote:
> I don't underestand the framework well enough to know what is going
> on.

JUnit is about as simple a framework as you can find and it comes with
source. I've found that a few minutes with any decent debugger should easily
answer any questions about JUnit framework operation. If this sounds
unrealistic you may want to revisit your choice in debugging tools.
